# HKAuthorizationRequestStatus.shouldRequest

**Case**

The application has not yet requested authorization for all the specified data types.

## Declaration

```swift
case shouldRequest
```

## Statuses

- **HKAuthorizationRequestStatus.unknown**: The authorization request status could not be determined because an error occurred.
- **HKAuthorizationRequestStatus.unnecessary**: The application has already requested authorization for all the specified data types.
